hook_en: Still eating vegetables? Lectins in vegetables may be destroying your gut. This is a plant's self-defense mechanism.
script_en:
Still eating vegetables? Lectins in vegetables may be destroying your gut. This is a plant's self-defense mechanism.

Plants can't move, so they produce lectin proteins to protect themselves from predators. These lectins attack your intestinal lining, potentially causing leaky gut syndrome. (Citation: PubMed research on lectins)

Furthermore, oxalates found abundantly in spinach and bamboo shoots bind with calcium to form kidney stones and block mineral absorption. (Citation: Established nutrition science) Phytates in legumes block the absorption of important minerals like zinc and magnesium. (Citation: Research proven)

Humans have evolved eating large mammal fat and meat for over 2 million years. We weren't designed to break down plants. Start eating 'meat only' today and stop the inflammation in your body.

Phytates in legumes block the absorption of important minerals like zinc and magnesium. Humans have evolved eating large mammal fat and meat for over 2 million years. We weren't designed to break down plants. Start eating 'meat only' today and stop the inflammation in your body.
fixedComment_en: Recommended for both those already practicing and those looking to transition. If you're starting Carnivore, this app is for you.
discussionComment_en: If you've stopped eating vegetables and noticed changes, please share in the comments.
